title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 240: Featuring John Carlson
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Washington Capitals defenseman John Carlson. John joins (48:59) to talk about his new merch collaboration with us, playing with Ovi, winning the Cup and a ton more. The guys also talk about the major news from Barstool Sports that the company has sold a minority stake to Penn National Gaming. The guys wrap up with some NHL news and a gambling corner (01:50:15) from Rear Admiral.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
